TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(object sender, SourceChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SourceChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SourceChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SourceChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SourceChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type SourceChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * SourceChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 引发事件以及事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event is raised, and the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将对特定侦听器元素处理“SourceChanged”事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托表示处理程序的 "SourceChanged" 事件不会作为公共 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 事件公开，这与大多数路由事件的情况相同。The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events. 相反，"SourceChanged" 是一个路由事件，该事件在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构的基础上保持不变并直接路由。Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed. 因为它是直接路由的，所以 `sender` 和事件数据中的 总是相同的对象。Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the in the event data are always the same object. 可以通过使用公共方法 和 ，将处理程序添加到此事件并删除其访问权限。You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods and . 事件的 `sender` 将是 的派生类。The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of .
